snippet: You can make the number of apps on your phone manageable by putting them in folders and regularly reviewing their usefulness.
abstract: Sam Grobart Tool Kit column presents six steps to decluttering a smartphone and making the number of apps manageable.
lead_paragraph: You can make the number of apps on your phone manageable by putting them in folders and regularly reviewing their usefulness.

headline.seo: Six Steps to Decluttering Your Smartphone’s Apps
headline.main: Six Steps to Decluttering Your Smartphone
headline.print_headline: Six Steps to Decluttering Your Smartphone
